Description:
Detects encoded base64 MZ header in the commandline

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Base64 MZ Header In CommandLine
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" (command="*TVqQAAMAAAAEAAAA*" OR command="*TVpQAAIAAAAEAA8A*" OR command="*TVqAAAEAAAAEABAA*" OR command="*TVoAAAAAAAAAAAAA*" OR command="*TVpTAQEAAAAEAAAA*")
